lines: Policy states that, regardless of station or birth, we are all seen as equals studying here in the scholasticate. Would that I had the authority to change that. Why? Well, to be frank, the clergy is simply no place for those of low birth.

Consider, if you will, the responsibilities of the clergy. Teaching the doctrines of the orthodoxy, serving as leaders and upholding the laws of Ishgard—would you trust such tasks to the vermin scurrying about in the Brume?
The church is not without its faults. It was only a matter of time before the people were given an excuse to decry its teachings.
But the Holy See has seen us through a thousand years of war. It has given us hope, something to unite the nation in our struggle for peace. I hardly see the fault in that.

obj.n: 聖アンダリム神学院の消えた書物
スコラスティケートコート
シャーレアン・ガーディアングローブ
ベストマンスラックス
シャーレアン・ガーディアンブーツ
